recipeIngredient.@value: 12 slices Pepperidge Farm® Whole Grain Honey Oat Bread
1   large tomato, cut into 6 thin slices

recipeInstructions.@value:
Spread 1 teaspoon mayonnaise spread on each bread slice. Top each of 6 bread slices with 4 slices turkey, 2 slices cheese and 1 slice tomato. Top with the remaining bread slices, mayonnaise spread-side down.Spray a 10-inch skillet with vegetable cooking spray and heat over medium heat for 1 minute.  Add the sandwiches in batches and cook until they're lightly browned on both sides and the cheese is melted.									Tips

					Serving Suggestion: Serve with Campbell's® Tomato soup and a tossed salad with your favorite dressing.
